summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 2, 3 and 4, Block 11 and vacated alley adjoining same; Reserve "B", and vacated Seaview Avenue adjoining; all in Brygger's First Home Addition, and a portion of Government Lot 4, Section 11, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W. M., with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-163.
